oai_dc:dc.dc:title: VETIVER FARM: SOIL MANAGEMENT FROM A SMALLFARMER
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gomez, Jesus
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Soil tillage
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The experience is centralized to explain the lessons learned by the Gomez Salamanca family about the soil management using the terrace techniques and other things (i.e. biological machine) during more than 15 years.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Gomez, Jesus (2014) VETIVER FARM: SOIL MANAGEMENT FROM A SMALLFARMER. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
